scripts.build: prisma generate && node -e "const u=process.env.TURSO_DB_URL||process.env.DATABASE_URL||''; const cp=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const isLib=u.startsWith('libsql:'); const isPg=u.startsWith('postgres://')||u.startsWith('postgresql://'); if(isLib){ cp.spawnSync('npx',{stdio:'inherit',shell:true,args:['prisma','migrate','deploy']}); } else if(isPg){ const hasMig=fs.existsSync('prisma/migrations') && fs.readdirSync('prisma/migrations').length>0; const args= hasMig ? ['prisma','migrate','deploy'] : ['prisma','db','push']; cp.spawnSync('npx',{stdio:'inherit',shell:true,args}); }" && node ./node_modules/next/dist/bin/next build
